author: lightclient
content: My thinking is that the ERCs are moved to a separate repo exactly as is, numbers and all. On the EIPs repo we could leave in their places stub files `eip-x.md` "this ERC was moved to a separate repo, click here to be redirected". We would definitely need to update how the numbering works, probably would need to start using a spreadsheet to track numbers.

author: sky.cactus

content: I suppose if we can spare some development time, we could just have the bot become aware of all of the already used numbers and simply skip them when they happen (and manually assign a different one).
